channel.title: career on PHP in the Wild
channel.description: Recent content in career on PHP in the Wild

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Introduction Welcome. This would be my first ever writing in this blog. Well, then, obviously I owe you an introduction. My name is Muhammad Zaim, you can just call me Zaim for short. A lean guy with average height of Malaysian men. I was born on the 90s, grew in Malaysia and codes a lot. Career Early in my career, I was thought of working in the semiconductor industry. I couldn’t care less since I’m kinda working in some areas that actually included semiconductor (The CPU I used for programming for example).
